values.text:
You are invited to a

Hanukah

Celebration

From all of us at Blume to everyone celebrating
Hanukkah: wishing you a joy-filled holiday season!

 

We hope you have a wonderful celebration, and that
you get some quality self care time, too.

SUNDAY 18TH

DECEMBER
2022
2261 Market Street #4667 San Francisco, CA 94114
